mapper.select: select spa.id, spa.name, spa.code, spa.description, spa.group_id, spa.sort, spa.status, spa.create_by, spa.update_by, spa.create_time, spa.update_time, spa.deleted from tr_user_role tur left join tr_permission_role_menu tprm on tur.role_id = tprm.role_id left join tr_permission_menu_action tpma on tprm.menu_id = tpma.menu_id left join sys_permission_action spa on spa.id = tpma.action_id where tur.user_id = #{userId} and spa.deleted = '0' and spa.status = '1'

select spag.id "groupId", spag.name "groupName", spag.code "groupCode", spa.id "actionId", spa.name "actionName", spa.code "actionCode" from sys_permission_action_group spag left join sys_permission_action spa on spa.group_id = spag.id and spa.deleted = 0 and spa.status = 1 where spag.deleted = 0 order by spag.sort, spa.sort
